turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'd like to place an order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get four medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get pepperoni sausage and onions on all of them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you want 4 medium pizzas with pepperoni, sausage, and onions, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And I also have some special instructions. Can you make all those thin crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i can add that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $76, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be picking it up today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. No, that's it. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
